fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Open a roles thread during the day. At the start of the following night, a new channel will be created where all players can post roles.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, one of the following is chosen at random. You can't tell or suggest to anyone which one.
> - Before the end of the night, you may choose a role in your roles thread. You become that role.
> - Before the end of the night, you may choose a role in your roles thread. Its creator becomes that role.
> - Before the end of the night, you may choose a role in your roles thread and a player other than you. If their factions are the same, that player becomes that role.
- Rule 17 applies to roles posted in your roles thread.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have at least one player you converted win the game.
